verses.verse: Now <S%G1161><s%> in the fifteenth <S%G4003><s%> year <S%G2094><s%> of the reign <S%G2231><s%> of Tiberius <S%G5086><s%> Caesar, <S%G2541><s%> Pontius <S%G4194><s%> Pilate <S%G4091><s%> being governor <S%G2230><s%> of Judaea, <S%G2449><s%> and Herod <S%G2264><s%> being tetrarch <S%G5075><s%> of Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and his brother <S%G80><s%> Philip <S%G5376><s%> tetrarch <S%G5075><s%> of Ituraea <S%G2484><s%> and of the region <S%G5561><s%> of Trachonitis, <S%G5139><s%> and Lysanias <S%G3078><s%> the tetrarch <S%G5075><s%> of Abilene, <S%G9><s%>

Annas <S%G452><s%> and Caiaphas <S%G2533><s%> being <S%G1909><s%> the high <S%G749><s%> priests, <S%G749><s%> the word <S%G4487><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> to John <S%G2491><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Zacharias <S%G2197><s%> in the wilderness. <S%G2048><s%>

And he came <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the country <S%G4066><s%> about <S%G4066><s%> Jordan, <S%G2446><s%> preaching <S%G2784><s%> the baptism <S%G908><s%> of repentance <S%G3341><s%> for the remission <S%G859><s%> of sins; <S%G266><s%>

As it is written <S%G1125><s%> in the book <S%G976><s%> of the words <S%G3056><s%> of Esaias <S%G2268><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> The voice <S%G5456><s%> of one crying <S%G994><s%> in the wilderness, <S%G2048><s%> Prepare <S%G2090><s%> you the way <S%G3598><s%> of the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> his paths <S%G5147><s%> straight. <S%G2117><s%>

Every <S%G3956><s%> valley <S%G5327><s%> shall be filled, <S%G4137><s%> and every <S%G3956><s%> mountain <S%G3735><s%> and hill <S%G1015><s%> shall be brought <S%G5013><s%> low; <S%G5013><s%> and the crooked <S%G4646><s%> shall be made <S%G1519><s%> straight, <S%G2117><s%> and the rough <S%G5138><s%> ways <S%G3598><s%> shall be made <S%G1519><s%> smooth; <S%G3006><s%>
And all <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> shall see <S%G3700><s%> the salvation <S%G4992><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> he to the multitude <S%G3793><s%> that came <S%G1607><s%> forth <S%G1607><s%> to be baptized <S%G907><s%> of him, O generation <S%G1081><s%> of vipers, <S%G2191><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> has warned <S%G5263><s%> you to flee <S%G5343><s%> from the wrath <S%G3709><s%> to come? <S%G3195><s%>

Bring <S%G4160><s%> forth <S%G4160><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> fruits <S%G2590><s%> worthy <S%G514><s%> of repentance, <S%G3341><s%> and begin <S%G756><s%> not to say <S%G3004><s%> within <S%G1722><s%> yourselves, <S%G1438><s%> We have <S%G2192><s%> Abraham <S%G11><s%> to our father: <S%G3962><s%> for I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, That God <S%G2316><s%> is able <S%G1410><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> stones <S%G3037><s%> to raise <S%G1453><s%> up children <S%G5043><s%> to Abraham. <S%G11><s%>

And now <S%G2235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> the ax <S%G513><s%> is laid <S%G2749><s%> to the root <S%G4491><s%> of the trees: <S%G1186><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> tree <S%G1186><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> which brings <S%G4160><s%> not forth <S%G4160><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> fruit <S%G2590><s%> is hewn <S%G1581><s%> down, <S%G1581><s%> and cast <S%G906><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the fire. <S%G4442><s%>
And the people <S%G3793><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> shall we do <S%G4160><s%> then? <S%G3767><s%>

He answers <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to them, He that has <S%G2192><s%> two <S%G1417><s%> coats, <S%G5509><s%> let him impart <S%G3330><s%> to him that has <S%G2192><s%> none; <S%G3361><s%> and he that has <S%G2192><s%> meat, <S%G1033><s%> let him do <S%G4160><s%> likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

Then <S%G1161><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> publicans <S%G5057><s%> to be baptized, <S%G907><s%> and said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Master, <S%G1320><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> shall we do? <S%G4160><s%>
And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Exact <S%G4238><s%> no <S%G3367><s%> more <S%G4119><s%> than <S%G3844><s%> that which is appointed <S%G1299><s%> you.

And the soldiers <S%G4754><s%> likewise <S%G2532><s%> demanded <S%G1905><s%> of him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> And what <S%G5101><s%> shall we do? <S%G4160><s%> And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Do <S%G1286><s%> violence <S%G1286><s%> to no <S%G3367><s%> man, <S%G3367><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> accuse <S%G4811><s%> any falsely; and be content <S%G714><s%> with your <S%G5216><s%> wages. <S%G3800><s%>

And as the people <S%G2992><s%> were in expectation, <S%G4328><s%> and all <S%G3956><s%> men mused <S%G1260><s%> in their hearts <S%G2588><s%> of John, <S%G2491><s%> whether <S%G3379><s%> he were the Christ, <S%G5547><s%> or not;

John <S%G2491><s%> answered, <S%G611><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> to them all, <S%G537><s%> I indeed <S%G3303><s%> baptize <S%G907><s%> you with water; <S%G5204><s%> but one mightier <S%G2478><s%> than I comes, <S%G2064><s%> the lace <S%G2438><s%> of whose <S%G3739><s%> shoes <S%G5266><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> not worthy <S%G2425><s%> to unloose: <S%G3089><s%> he shall baptize <S%G907><s%> you with the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> and with fire: <S%G4442><s%>

Whose <S%G3739><s%> fan <S%G4425><s%> is in his hand, <S%G5495><s%> and he will thoroughly <S%G1245><s%> purge <S%G1245><s%> his floor, <S%G257><s%> and will gather <S%G4863><s%> the wheat <S%G4621><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> his garner; <S%G596><s%> but the chaff <S%G892><s%> he will burn <S%G2618><s%> with fire <S%G4442><s%> unquenchable. <S%G762><s%>
And many <S%G4183><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> things in his exhortation <S%G3870><s%> preached <S%G2097><s%> he to the people. <S%G2992><s%>

But Herod <S%G2264><s%> the tetrarch, <S%G5076><s%> being reproved <S%G1651><s%> by him for Herodias <S%G2266><s%> his brother <S%G80><s%> Philip's <S%G5376><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> and for all <S%G3956><s%> the evils <S%G4190><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> had done, <S%G4160><s%>
Added <S%G4369><s%> yet <S%G2596><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> above <S%G1909><s%> all, <S%G3956><s%> that he shut <S%G2623><s%> up John <S%G2491><s%> in prison. <S%G5438><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> when <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> all <S%G537><s%> the people <S%G2992><s%> were baptized, <S%G907><s%> it came <S%G1096><s%> to pass, that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> being baptized, <S%G907><s%> and praying, <S%G4336><s%> the heaven <S%G3772><s%> was opened, <S%G455><s%>

And the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> descended <S%G2597><s%> in a bodily <S%G4984><s%> shape <S%G1491><s%> like <S%G5616><s%> a dove <S%G4058><s%> on him, and a voice <S%G5456><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> from heaven, <S%G3772><s%> which said, <S%G3004><s%> You are <S%G1488><s%> my beloved <S%G27><s%> Son; <S%G5207><s%> in you I am well <S%G2106><s%> pleased. <S%G2106><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> himself <S%G846><s%> began <S%G756><s%> to be about <S%G5616><s%> thirty <S%G5144><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> of age, being <S%G5607><s%> (as was supposed) <S%G3543><s%> the son <S%G5207><s%> of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> which was the son of Heli, <S%G2242><s%>

Which was the son of Matthat, <S%G3158><s%> which was the son of Levi, <S%G3017><s%> which was the son of Melchi, <S%G3197><s%> which was the son of Janna, <S%G2388><s%> which was the son of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%>

Which was the son of Mattathias, <S%G3161><s%> which was the son of Amos, <S%G301><s%> which was the son of Naum, <S%G3486><s%> which was the son of Esli, <S%G2069><s%> which was the son of Nagge, <S%G3477><s%>

Which was the son of Maath, <S%G3092><s%> which was the son of Mattathias, <S%G3161><s%> which was the son of Semei, <S%G4584><s%> which was the son of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> which was the son of Juda, <S%G2455><s%>

Which was the son of Joanna, <S%G2489><s%> which was the son of Rhesa, <S%G4488><s%> which was the son of Zorobabel, <S%G2216><s%> which was the son of Salathiel, <S%G4528><s%> which was the son of Neri, <S%G3518><s%>

Which was the son of Melchi, <S%G3197><s%> which was the son of Addi, <S%G78><s%> which was the son of Cosam, <S%G2973><s%> which was the son of Elmodam, <S%G1678><s%> which was the son of Er, <S%G2262><s%>

Which was the son of Jose, <S%G2499><s%> which was the son of Eliezer, <S%G1663><s%> which was the son of Jorim, <S%G2497><s%> which was the son of Matthat, <S%G3158><s%> which was the son of Levi, <S%G3017><s%>

Which was the son of Simeon, <S%G4826><s%> which was the son of Juda, <S%G2455><s%> which was the son of Joseph, <S%G2501><s%> which was the son of Jonan, <S%G2494><s%> which was the son of Eliakim, <S%G1662><s%>

Which was the son of Melea, <S%G3190><s%> which was the son of Menan, <S%G3104><s%> which was the son of Mattatha, <S%G3160><s%> which was the son of Nathan, <S%G3481><s%> which was the son of David, <S%G1138><s%>

Which was the son of Jesse, <S%G2421><s%> which was the son of Obed, <S%G5601><s%> which was the son of Booz, <S%G1003><s%> which was the son of Salmon, <S%G4533><s%> which was the son of Naasson, <S%G3476><s%>

Which was the son of Aminadab, <S%G284><s%> which was the son of Aram, <S%G689><s%> which was the son of Esrom, <S%G2074><s%> which was the son of Phares, <S%G5329><s%> which was the son of Juda, <S%G2455><s%>

Which was the son of Jacob, <S%G2384><s%> which was the son of Isaac, <S%G2464><s%> which was the son of Abraham, <S%G11><s%> which was the son of Thara, <S%G2291><s%> which was the son of Nachor, <S%G3493><s%>

Which was the son of Saruch, <S%G4562><s%> which was the son of Ragau, <S%G4466><s%> which was the son of Phalec, <S%G5317><s%> which was the son of Heber, <S%G1443><s%> which was the son of Sala, <S%G4527><s%>

Which was the son of Cainan, <S%G2536><s%> which was the son of Arphaxad, <S%G742><s%> which was the son of Sem, <S%G4590><s%> which was the son of Noe, <S%G3575><s%> which was the son of Lamech, <S%G2984><s%>

Which was the son of Mathusala, <S%G3103><s%> which was the son of Enoch, <S%G1802><s%> which was the son of Jared, <S%G2391><s%> which was the son of Maleleel, <S%G3121><s%> which was the son of Cainan, <S%G2536><s%>
Which was the son of Enos, <S%G1800><s%> which was the son of Seth, <S%G4589><s%> which was the son of Adam, <S%G76><s%> which was the son of God. <S%G2316><s%>
